mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNSCRAP (SCRAP_ID, NTT_ID, BBS_ID, SCRAP_NM, USE_AT, FRST_REGISTER_ID, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ) VALUES ( #{scrapId}, #{nttId}, #{bbsId}, #{scrapNm}, 'Y', #{frstRegisterId}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT a.SCRAP_ID, a.NTT_ID, a.BBS_ID, a.SCRAP_NM, a.USE_AT, TO_CHAR(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, b.USER_NM as FRST_REGISTER_NM, a.FRST_REGISTER_ID FROM COMTNSCRAP a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.FRST_REGISTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID WHERE a.SCRAP_ID = #{scrapId}
mapper.update: UPDATE COMTNSCRAP SET SCRAP_NM = #{scrapNm}, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATE WHERE SCRAP_ID = #{scrapId}
